title: He Left Me In Another State
itunes:title: He Left Me In Another State
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m in my mid 40s and I’ve been married for 3 years. A month ago, my husband drove me to my hometown for one of my childhood friend’s wedding. We went to visit with my parents before the festivities and then we checked into our hotel. Everything was cool and we were having a good time until later that evening. We went to the rehearsal dinner and I got to see a lot of my old friends. I look the same as I did when I was 20 years old and my friends haven’t aged well....................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m in my mid 40s and I’ve been married for 3 years. A month ago, my husband drove me to my hometown for one of my childhood friend’s wedding. We went to visit with my parents before the festivities and then we checked into our hotel. Everything was cool and we were having a good time until later that evening. We went to the rehearsal dinner and I got to see a lot of my old friends. I look the same as I did when I was 20 years old and my friends haven’t aged well....................
